title: The Saint
occurrences: I'm from Spain, but I'm named for a Peruvian Saint
I was named for a Saint who was a very wealthy man.
I was named after a Saint...
Named after a Saint who betrayed his best friend.
- So you were named for a Saint. - No, Simon the magician.
I was named after Saint Augustin, who coined my favorite phrase:
After all, you are my personal Saint.
You have to be very good and usually very dead to become a Saint.
He charms women, this so-called Saint.
I am offended. All I got from this Saint was near-death experiences.
